metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38072 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the stl_fix_normal_directions functionality of ADMesh Master Commit 767a105 and v0.98.4. A specially-crafted stl file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: admesh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
